title: Miley Cyrus Just Did Lakshmi Puja At Her Home Because She Loves 'Fruit Bowl' Over Super Bowl
text:
ENTERTAINMENT Miley Cyrus Just Did Lakshmi Puja At Her Home Because She Loves 'Fruit Bowl' Over Super Bowl Good lord. Adrija Bose Social Media Editor NEW! HIGHLIGHT AND SHARE   Miley Cyrus/Instagram ADVERTISEMENT 
While most of America was glued to Super Bowl 51 on the television, Miley Cyrus chose to do something completely different. The singer performed a 'Lakshmi puja' at her home in Malibu on Sunday. 
The 24-year-old singer posted a picture on Instagram, which shows a traditional Hindu prayer set-up with the Goddess of Wealth being worshipped. An offering of fruits and halwa sits next to the goddess. 
"#FruitBowl over Super... #offering," she captioned it. A photo posted by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Feb 5, 2017 at 8:01pm PST 
Another Instagram post shows a room with cushions arranged on floor mats, and flower petals scattered around. There are candles in glass jars dotting around the room. Cyrus captioned the photograph, 'Puja'. A photo posted by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Feb 5, 2017 at 4:56pm PST 
The singer's affinity for Hinduism is not new news. Among her many tattoos — and 'the wrecking ball' star has several — many have Hindu associations. She has the word 'karma' inked on her finger and the 'Om' symbol inked on the inside of her left wrist. A photo posted by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Jan 14, 2017 at 4:20pm PST
